summary: Warpaint used by Kratos in the 'God of War' series
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/mWMUS.png[/img]



This mod [b][u]'replaces'[/b][/u] the skin texture of your [u]male[/u] character in the game of Skyrim.
(To get the facepaint enter 'showracemenu' into the console, to find it under the 'Head' section of character creation. It's Warpaint #10)


[size=4][b]- MALE ONLY -[/b][/size]

[size=4][b]- REQUIRES THE [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13712]'Unique Character'[/URL] MOD -[/b][/size]

This was mainly made as part of a series of mods im making to make the character similar to 'Kratos' from the 'God of War' series.


And before anyone says it, no I did not steal the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1433]'God of Warpaint'[/url] mod. I made the facepaint myself and added it to this for convenience. Besides, that mod doesn't make the facepaint go all the way round the head like I wanted it to.[/center]

[b]
=============
---Installation---
=============
[/b][list]
[*] Download with Nexus Mod Manager and make sure its checked under the Mods tab.
[*] Or download manualy and extract to your Data folder in your Skyrim directory.[/list]

[b]
============
---Changelog---
============
[/b]
[u][b]v1.3[/b][/u]
- Corrected file paths for the recent version of [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13712][B]'Unique Character'[/B][/URL]

[u][b]v1.2[/b][/u]
- Corrected file paths
- Updated body textures ([url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2488]Better Males[/url])

[u][b]v1.1[/b][/u]
- Now requires the [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13712][B]'Unique Character'[/B][/URL] mod
- Changed file formatting to fit the required mod

[u][b]v1.0[/b][/u]
- Initial release

[b]
=============
---Other Mods---
=============
